crypto-landing.banner_subtitle: A decentralized risk management system That disintermediates the Life assurance industry and globalizes the tokenized value of peoples’ lives on the NFT marketplace..
crypto-landing.mainfeature_subtitle: The extra-life tokenis a real person’s life representation in the digital world in a NFT format. A person can generate a token that represents their life and place it in a marketplace
crypto-landing.morefeature_subtitle1: To give decision power to the holder of each individual token a DAO is manedtary.
crypto-landing.morefeature_subtitle2: The coin which the value of the assured sum is stated is called TIME.
crypto-landing.morefeature_subtitle3: TIME coins are changed to the desired stable coin defined by the contract.
crypto-landing.team_desc: The Once Team came together over the EthGlobal HackMoney Hakathon. We are from Colombia, Brazil, South Africa, Spain and Germany
